page.title: 05CHEDDAR EVENTS
page.content: Apart from such events like the fun run,school sports days,fetes and carnivals,there are two events that are special to Cheddar. CHEDDAR BED RACE is run on the first Saturday in June,when sponsored teams of five race around the village pushing a decorated bed.They wear fancy dress and during the run each team member has to drink a pint of beer in three different pubs and eat Cheddar cheese and dry biscuits in a fourth pub.Money raised is given to local charities. MAY DAY CELEBRATIONS are held on the first Monday in May at Fairlands House A May Queen is chosen from one of the girls of the village.There is Morris dancing,maypole dancing, stalls selling things like as ice cream and candy floss and games like skittles. They are lots of fun.
